text.div:
EncounterPatientNameSearchParameter

Parameter patient-name:string

Searches for Encounters based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?patient-name={name}

ResourceEncounter
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesEncounter
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: EncounterPatientNameSearchParameter
description: Searches for Encounters based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?patient-name={name}
